propositions.text: The document is titled '凤舞苍穹(女尊)'.
The prologue depicts a scene involving the Emperor, Empress, and the Crown Prince.
The Empress has gone to catch someone in the act of infidelity.
The person caught is identified as the Crown Prince.
The document is then divided into numbered chapters.
Chapter 2 is titled '祭天' (Sacrifice to Heaven).

concepts.name: 凤舞苍穹
concepts.context: Document title, suggesting a celestial or epic theme.

concepts.name: 女尊
concepts.context: Indicates a 'female-dominant' theme in the story.

concepts.name: 皇上
concepts.context: Refers to the Emperor, a central figure in the prologue.

concepts.name: 皇后娘娘
concepts.context: Refers to the Empress, a central figure in the prologue involved in 'catching' someone.

concepts.name: 东宫太子
concepts.context: Refers to the Crown Prince, implicated in infidelity in the prologue.

concepts.name: 偷情
concepts.context: Title of Chapter 1, directly related to the prologue's events.

concepts.name: 祭天
concepts.context: Title of Chapter 2, suggesting a ritualistic or significant event.

concepts.name: 醉酒
concepts.context: Title of Chapter 3, implying a state of intoxication and its consequences.

concepts.name: 刺杀
concepts.context: Title of Chapter 4, indicating an act of violence or attempt on someone's life.

concepts.name: 救人
concepts.context: Title of Chapter 5, suggesting an act of rescue or deliverance.

concepts.name: 离开
concepts.context: Title of Chapter 6, implying departure or separation.

concepts.name: 归来
concepts.context: Title of Chapter 7, indicating a return or reappearance.

concepts.name: 权势
concepts.context: Title of Chapter 8, focusing on themes of power and influence.

concepts.name: 决裂
concepts.context: Title of Chapter 9, suggesting a breakdown in relationships or alliances.

concepts.name: 往事
concepts.context: Title of Chapter 10, indicating a focus on past events and history.

concepts.name: 仇恨
concepts.context: Title of Chapter 11, highlighting themes of animosity and revenge.

concepts.name: 遗嘱
concepts.context: Title of Chapter 12, suggesting a testament or final instructions.

concepts.name: 承诺
concepts.context: Title of Chapter 13, implying a pledge or commitment.

concepts.name: 救赎
concepts.context: Title of Chapter 14, indicating a process of salvation or atonement.

concepts.name: 终结
concepts.context: Title of Chapter 15, marking the final part of the narrative.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured with a title, a prologue, and a series of numbered chapters. The prologue sets up an initial conflict, and the subsequent chapters present themes and events that likely develop the narrative. The chapter titles indicate a progression of plot points and thematic elements.
